verses.verse: Simon <S%G4826><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, to them that have obtained <S%G2975><s%> like precious <S%G2472><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> with us <S%G2254><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: Simon: or, Symeon God: Gr. of our God and Saviour

Grace <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> be multiplied <S%G4129><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>,

According as <S%G5613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> divine <S%G2304><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> hath given <S%G1433><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that pertain unto <S%G4314><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of him that hath called <S%G2564><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to <S%G1223><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> virtue <S%G703><s%>: to: or, by

Whereby <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> are given <S%G1433><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> exceeding great <S%G3176><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> promises <S%G1862><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> ye might be <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> of the divine <S%G2304><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%>, having escaped <S%G668><s%> the corruption <S%G5356><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> lust <S%G1939><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1161><s%> beside <S%G846><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, giving <S%G3923><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%>, add <S%G2023><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> virtue <S%G703><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> virtue <S%G703><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> temperance <S%G1466><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> temperance <S%G1466><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%>;
And <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> brotherly kindness <S%G5360><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> brotherly kindness <S%G5360><s%> charity <S%G26><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if these things <S%G5023><s%> be <S%G5225><s%> in you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abound <S%G4121><s%>, they make <S%G2525><s%> you that ye shall neither <S%G3756><s%> be barren <S%G692><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>. barren: Gr. idle

But <S%G1063><s%> he that <S%G3739><s%> lacketh <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3918><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%>, and cannot see afar off <S%G3467><s%>, and hath forgotten <S%G3024><s%> <S%G2983><s%> that he was purged from <S%G2512><s%> his <S%G846><s%> old <S%G3819><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> the rather <S%G3123><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, give diligence <S%G4704><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> election <S%G1589><s%> sure <S%G949><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> if ye do <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, ye shall <S%G4218><s%> <S%G4417><s%> never <S%G3364><s%> fall <S%G4218><s%> <S%G4417><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> an entrance <S%G1529><s%> shall be ministered <S%G2023><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> abundantly <S%G4146><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the everlasting <S%G166><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I will <S%G272><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be negligent <S%G272><s%> to put <S%G5279><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> always <S%G104><s%> in remembrance <S%G5279><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>, though <S%G2539><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> them, and <S%G2532><s%> be established <S%G4741><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the present <S%G3918><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.

Yea <S%G1161><s%>, I think it <S%G2233><s%> meet <S%G1342><s%>, as long as <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> tabernacle <S%G4638><s%>, to stir <S%G1326><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> up <S%G1326><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> putting you in remembrance <S%G5280><s%>;

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> shortly <S%G5031><s%> I must <S%G2076><s%> put off <S%G595><s%> this my <S%G3450><s%> tabernacle <S%G4638><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath shewed <S%G1213><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will endeavour <S%G4704><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> may be able <S%G2192><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> decease <S%G1841><s%> to have <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%> always <S%G1539><s%> in remembrance <S%G3420><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G1811><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> followed <S%G1811><s%> cunningly devised <S%G4679><s%> fables <S%G3454><s%>, when we made known <S%G1107><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> coming <S%G3952><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> eyewitnesses <S%G2030><s%> of his <S%G1565><s%> majesty <S%G3168><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he received <S%G2983><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, when there came <S%G5342><s%> such <S%G5107><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G5259><s%> the excellent <S%G3169><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, in <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am well pleased <S%G2106><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> which came <S%G5342><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>, when we were <S%G5607><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%>.

We have <S%G2192><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a more sure <S%G949><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of prophecy <S%G4397><s%>; whereunto <S%G3739><s%> ye do <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> that ye take heed <S%G4337><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto a light <S%G3088><s%> that shineth <S%G5316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a dark <S%G850><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> dawn <S%G1306><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the day star <S%G5459><s%> arise <S%G393><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>:

Knowing <S%G1097><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of the scripture <S%G1124><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> of any private <S%G2398><s%> interpretation <S%G1955><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> came <S%G5342><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in old time <S%G4218><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> men <S%G444><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> as they were moved <S%G5342><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>. in old time: or, at any time
